discussion.content: An end user can't save the report as the primary report. Correct answer is C.

choices.E: Download the report to a CSV or HTML file
choices.B: Add a filter to the report
choices.D: Save the report as the primary report
choices.A: Add a control break on Department
choices.C: Save the report as a named report

questions.question_text:
ABC Company developed an employee directly by using an interactive report.
The HR manager (an end user) has customized his or her report to show only employees in the HR department, and wants to review the same report weekly.
How can the HR manager achieve this?

choices.A: Unzip app100_files.zip, and upload each directory individually.
choices.D: Upload app100_files.zip, and set Unzip File to Yes.
choices.C: In Shared Components, create the required subdirectories. Unzip app100_files.zip, and upload each file into their subdirectories.
choices.B: Upload app100_files.zip to the file server and unzip the file. In User Interface Properties, edit the Theme, and set JavaScript File URLs.

questions.question_text:
Betty has created a zip file, app100_files.zip, to include all of her static application files that she references in her application. The files are divided into different subdirectories for JavaScript and CSS.
How can Betty upload the static files, so they can be referenced, and maintain the subdirectory structure?
Which three actions can be performed by a workspace administrator? (Choose three.)

choices.B: View usage reports for a workspace

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BCD
comment better like this to show the community answer

choices.D: Use the Create Page Wizard to re-create the pages.
choices.C: Delete Data Load Definition and re-create it manually.

questions.question_text:
When testing the Data Load Wizard pages, you realize that you forgot to add a transformation rule.
What should you do to add the transformation rule?

George used to Create Page Wizard to create a calendar on the DEMO_ORDERS table based on the ORDER_TIMESTAMP column. However, the calendar shows only the month and list views.
What does George need to do to show week and day views?

discussion.content: The Answer is B. Confirmed from Apex Simulation

choices.C: Set Maximum Events / Day to greater than 1
choices.D: Select Week and Day under Calendar Views and Navigation
